Pre-Game Insights: Manager Stephen Vogt expressed his unwavering support for Emmanuel Clase as the team's closer
Others: Emmanuel Clase rebounded in Game 5 after struggling in the previous two games
Clase's return to form helped send the game into extras
Hunter Gaddis served up a go-ahead three-run homer to Juan Soto in the 10th inning
Brayan Rocchio had a crucial error in the 10th inning that allowed the Yankees to score
Others (continued): The Guardians' bullpen, led by 'The Big Four' (Cade Smith, Tim Herrin, Gaddis, and Clase), had a strong postseason but showed signs of fatigue as October went on
Cleveland's bullpen paced this deep playoff run by combining for 53 2/3 innings with a 3.52 ERA, while starting pitchers combined for 33 2/3 innings and a 3.82 ERA
